Review.Titre: Shipping Issues
Review.Contenu: No where on the order checkout page does it say signature will be required however this is how it was shipped. It also does not say you cant have it held at a access point down the street. The ONLY thing it says is you can't ship to a different state than the credit card billing address. Our UPS account has a shipment release authorization but it says not available due to shipper restrictions. We then tried to have it held for pickup at a access point but that too is restricted by the shipper. We then called Strobes and More and they told us we have to wait home all day for UPS. We have never had this issue with anyone else for such a small order, $1,100. We will never be ordering from Strobes and More again.

Review.Titre: we received a lightbar that had a bad…

We ordered a havis Console through Strobes and More for a 2023 Chevrolet Silverado with BENCH seats and they sent one for a 2019 Silverado with bucket seats and refuse to take it back.

Review.Titre: Received wrong part

The president of this company is a complete and utter D.A.As you can see they can’t count either. They again won’t deny what they have done. Today some uneducated dude who shows as President of the company thought he was going to outsmart me. All these emails and screenshots are available. Review.Titre: Product caught fire denied warranty replacement even though it caught fire while under warranty.
Review.Contenu: Had been very pleased with them recommended to many friends and have been responsible for at least $2000 in sales to their website. Had one of their tailgators catch fire while still under warranty, had some difficulty finding a shipping tube to send it back in with. Recommended it to a friend because other than this one which I felt to be defective, I love the product. Ended up using the shipping tube theirs came in to return mine. By that point it was a few months out of warranty, I had documentation proving the event of it failing and catching fire occurred prior to the warranty ending and was declined warranty coverage on a replacement due to it being out of warranty by the time they received it.*in reply to their reply* I’m not sure how 2 am being the time this shows it was posted has relevance however 1. It was done about midnight but between time zone difference and there being a delay in reviews posting it appeared to be later. 2. I think it’s a given that first responders keep odd hours and I posted that before bed after having been busy all day.Also I emailed Lauren back in April asking that it be reconsidered after having talked on the phone including a picture of the product that was damaged that also included a time stamp from when it was still in warranty and never received a reply. This email also included a order number.In regards to the fuse it did blow after catching fire but regardless of that the product failed while under warranty and isn’t being replaced as if it were, that’s where my concern lies.

Review.Titre: LED lens doesn't fit, not returnable
Review.Contenu: A perfectly usable, returnable part is, in the fine print, not returnable. I needed a replacement lens for Whelen 600 LED light head, and found one advertised as such. I bought it, only to find out Whelen 600 LED light head lenses are glued in place and not replaceable. It should not be advertised as being compatible with Whelen 600 *LED*, as it implies the lens is replaceable when it is not. StrobesnMore would not accept the return of an untouched part.

Review.Titre: I ordered and received two sets of…
Review.Contenu: I ordered and received two sets of sidewinder running board lights, both sets failed and were replaced under warranty. My issue is per your policy, my vehicles were down twice to remove and replace them. I would have preferred to pay for the replacement, and be refunded when I shipped the faulty product to you. Having the vehicle in the shop twice was a big inconvenience, and the replacement lights are not as bright. I have spent a lot of money  with you guys, and I must say I'm not completely satisfied with the products and policies.

Review.Titre: Communication was lacking
Review.Contenu: Communication was lacking. We had an installer scheduled to arrive at our department to upfit a priority cruiser and needed the parts/lights the next day. We paid for next day shipping and only received a partial order.  There was no communication that the lights were on back order nor were we refunded any of the shipping costs for the lights. We had to call customer service who stated  that they don't guarantee that items are always in stock.  It would have been prudent if this company would have informed us that when placing the order instead of tracking them down for the information.

Review.Titre: I forgot to add a coupon code for free…
Review.Contenu: I forgot to add a coupon code for free shipping. I emailed the sales department with in a couple of hours of placing my order. I explained the situation and they would not add the code to my order. Strobesnmore lost a customer over $13 and change. I will do any future business with another company.

Review.Titre: I ordered two light bars
Review.Contenu: I ordered two light bars.  They both arrived damaged.  I was referred to the manufacturer for replacement parts.  The manufacturer has not responded to my warranty claim in a month. This means I’ve had two light bars that I payed over $800 for laying around useless for two months.  No idea when I will get replacement parts. Have been a loyal strobes n  more customer for about 10 years.  Probably won’t buy from them any more.

Review.Titre: They send you what they want.
Review.Contenu: I place an order for spilt Red/blue lights. And was send blue lights only. When I called to informed them of the problem, they stated that was on the invoice. What I ordered and what was on the invoice was two different things. I installed a lot of emergency equipment, so I tell my customers to order from your company. But after speaking to one of your representatives it’s like she didn’t care of the problem. So that just tells me you don’t care for my business. No problem, there are other companies that are more than willing to take care of us.

Review.Titre: Deceptive reviews and product info
Review.Contenu: Was not super pleased with product and wrote a negative review that was never posted to product page. Looks like only positive reviews make it through. Part of the problem was that the product information listed on the page was incorrect, but I guess you're not allowed to point that out.

Review.Titre: Good quality product but horrible…
Review.Contenu: Good quality product but horrible customer service. I placed an order online to be delivered to the place I’m working and had no issues doing so. The order got delivered to my mailing address across the country with no heads up to me and I’m being told by customer service rep that is now my problem with a condescending tone.  This is not the first time I’ve order a product to a different state from my mailing address and it was not an issue before. I understand if things change but if you’re not going to send it to the address requested don’t send it before confirming with the customer.

Review.Titre: Zero response from sales/customer service
Review.Contenu: I accidentally ordered lights that were too small for my van. I need to place a much more expensive order but I wanted to secure a return/exchange first. I emailed on February 4th and again on March 5th requesting a return and received no response.

Review.Titre: Items Not In Stock As Advertised

Not even offer a similar item for the same price, but an inferior product for more money. I have used strobesnmore in the past, know many friends who have as well. After this, they left a bad taste and I do not believe I would deal with this company again.

Review.Titre: I can't give less than one star or I…

Accusing us of trying to get something for free...give me a break.  Trying to deal with these people is next to impossible once they have your credit card  number. Review.Titre: I ordered a LED magnetic strobe several…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a LED magnetic strobe several months ago. That evening, I realized that I did not take the dimensions into consideration. I called back 1st thing the next morning. I asked the guy answering the phone if the unit had already been sent out. He asked my name, he looked it up and said how can I help you? I replied the dimensions were not going to work. He immediately said they were already out and there were no refunds... period. He was absolutely non sympathetic in any way and could have cared less.OK, I will not go further than this.Now, I have had to jury rig a mount to fit and have used it for the 1st time. The 2 position switch stopped working on the #2 position. Once again, I used it once and the switch does not work in the #2 flash position.I am not a happy customer.

Review.Titre: I ordered a light a couple of months…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a light a couple of months ago. It was a specialty item from Whalen and I wasn't told that it would take well over two months to get the light. If I was advised that it would have taken so long I wouldn't have ordered it. I did email your company, and they explained the situation well, however that was after 3 weeks of waiting for the light to be shipped. I'm not sure how you can make this not happen again, but I probably will not purchase anymore lights from your company in the future. Our emergency light salesman is no longer in business and I was hopeful that your company would be the replacement. I obviously was wrong. Thank you for your time, and I still have not received my light. I guess my business and future business with you doesn't mean anything to you all.

Review.Titre: NOT COOL!

Review.Titre: Poor customer service.
Review.Contenu: I usually buy all of my lighting and siren equipment from strobes n more for both my department and personal vehicles. In my last order I received a used light head. The bag it came in was cut open and taped shut and the protective film that should have been on the lens was missing. There was also a broken screw in the back of it like it was installed and removed. Upon receiving it I immediately contacted customer service and sent pictures. They assured me it was not used eve though it was obvious it was used. I replied back asking for it to be exchanged since I paid for a new unopened light. They said they would send a return label, but it has been almost two weeks and I have not received it. Every time I try to contact customer service I get told it should come in the next few days. I will not purchase anything from strobes n more again unless this is resolved quickly.

Review.Titre: Lacking
Review.Contenu: Ordered 6 strobes received 4. box has a huge green label saying claims will not be honored after 24hours, so it's my fault for not opening the box before I was ready to install.

Review.Titre: Unprofessional business

I ordered a light in a specific color combination, and also specifically added in the comments at checkout what exactly I need as a combo. After receiving the wrong combo (3 weeks later)  the owner Louis called me, after i explained the problem, he refused to work with me, forcing me to dispute it through paypal. The owner of the business actually hung up the phone on me because he didn't like my tone of voice. Shop elsewhere. He specifically told me that if ripped the bag open, which i did in order to check the light, they will charge me return shipping and restocking fee.When i mentioned that I also specified in the comments at checkout of what exactly I'm ordering, he said that they don't really pay attention to those comments. Why have a comments section at checkout?

Review.Titre: use caution/ read fine print
Review.Contenu: too many loopholes, make sure you read before placing your order.  apparently, my order is a "made to order" product and now unable to cancel or even get a refund.  I am now at the Mercy of a third-party company Fenix; strobes n more has nothing to do with product delivery.  If I knew then, my item was not coming from strobes n more and needed to be made to order, I would have saved me $175 and needing to wait for a bs Target delivery date of 01/21/2022.  Strobes n more took my money, nowhere did I see it posted item is made to order and drop shipped from manufacturer.  Senseless, loophole for company to get funds and make customer wait.  I have been in customer service field for over 20 years and never had this type of service.  To anyone ordering from strobes n more, read the fine print before entering your payment information.  Never again will I use strobes n more again, and be sure, I will share this review on every social platform so others will not have to go down my path.

Review.Contenu: Took way too long to get my items and was charged for two items that I never got. Customer service has been non-existent.

Review.Titre: Up to date stock information
Review.Contenu: On Jan 24th I placed an order for (6) Whelen M-7AC and (6) Whelen M-7WC and were told all twelve were in stock and should ship out the next day. On Jan 28 I received a package with only the M-7WC modules and no amber modules. On that same day (Friday 1/28) I sent an email to Brittany requesting and explanation on way I did not receive my order complete. On Monday 1/31 I received an email stating "The amber are on backorder right now. We are expecting a stock delivery in the next couple of weeks. As soon as we receive them we will ship them out to you." I contacted my customer and he called back on the 2nd of February and said he needed them sooner than 2 weeks and canceled the balance of the order with me. The next day, Feb 3rd I called to called the balance of the order and I was told that the lights couldn't be canceled because they were actually out for delivery. I did receive them that day. In fact they had shipped from Strobes and More the day before the reply was sent out that it would be and additional 2 weeks before they would arrive. Please provide more up to date shipping information so that we know when the product might be available.

Review.Titre: 30 years in LE and never dealt with…
Review.Contenu: 30 years in LE and never dealt with such an unreputable company.  False advertising.  Buyer beware.  No legitimate return policy.

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service/Communication
Review.Contenu: I ordered a console for my new truck 5 weeks before it had to be installed. By week three (two weeks before it was going to be installed), I hadn't received it yet. I called the company and they told me that they needed additional information about my vehicle, so it was going to be another 4 more weeks before I would receive it. I asked them why they didn't communicate that before now. They said that they did try to call but I never received the call or message. I told them that I wanted to just cancel the order because I was going to use another company that could get it for me a lot sooner. Unfortunately, they told me that they couldn't refund my money. I had already placed the order and because it was a "special order" they wouldn't be able to give me a refund. How convenient, they hadn't started my order because they "needed additional information" but they sure could keep my money because it was a "special order"?!?! I will never use this company again.

Review.Titre: Did not receive my order
Review.Contenu: Did not receive my order.  The order was damaged via UPS while in transit to me (but never delivered to me) and reported to Strobesnmore, when I asked Strobesnmore to ship me my order, they made me wait until they worked out the damaged item with UPS when I never was not part of the damaged it or ever received anything from Strobesnmore.  They should have taken care of their customer while working out the separate issue with UPS.  I paid for 3 day shipping too.Here's the best part, I called asking about my order, was transferred to Dave, as he was working the claim with UPS.  Besides telling me "i don't know why they transferred you to me", He told me that they would not ship out my order until they work out the claim with UPS.So they have a customer order and paid for a product.  It gets damaged before ever delivered to the customer, and the customer will not get the product because of an issue Strobesnmore has with UPS.  I canceled the order and will go to a company that knows how to treat a customer.

Review.Titre: Ordered LED Lights and couldn't return…
Review.Contenu: Ordered LED Lights and couldn't return them for a different size.No credit for a Miss size No help from customer service

Review.Titre: Product fine, policies and fees are ridiculous
Review.Contenu: While the product seems fine, I was disappointed by the fairly draconian return restrictions. I ordered a light bar that ended up being an inch too wide. My installer, a former police officer and fire department chief (I point this out because he is a reliable, honorable person I trust), who recommends your company all the time, made the mistake when pulling it out of the box of cutting the zip tie holding the wires together, only to find that the bar was too long. He then simply placed it right back in the box. In returning it, was basically implied that I was lying in saying that no power had been applied to the bar, and it had not actually been installed in any way. To top that off, I paid for the bar, plus shipping. I returned it, paying for shipping, and then when I was told it was refused, not only did I have to pay for shipping BACK to me, but a $25 fee was added on top. This all seems like just a way to get more money out of people. I agree with paying for the shipping, but was the extra fee really necessary? I have already ordered other items (and fear any cancellation will incur more draconian fees) but once I receive this final order I will not be ordering from the company again. I only give two stars because the product is good, but management needs to look closely as to if they care to build long term business with customers, or adhere to rules, and charge unwarranted fees, to make an extra buck.

Review.Titre: Confusion
Review.Contenu: Lots of confusion without providing useful needed information. Order confirmation comes 2 days after order was placed. At no time was I given total cost of order. Several emails later, able to finally figure out total costs. I would say less than mediocre at best.

Review.Titre: Instructions are not very clear
Review.Contenu: Instructions are not very clear, unsure on where or how to connect the 7 connectors, no instructions on how they are connected. instructions say something about a blue wire, there is no blue wire. There are no tutorial videos on a GM truck just Ford and Ram

Review.Titre: Missing Items
Review.Contenu: Not all items ordered were received.  When the order was received I believed that all items were accounted for.  When customer service was contacted, because it was just over a month, they refused to supply the items that were missing even though they were a minimal cost.  It's stated that the order was signed for....UPS delivered the package and it was not signed for.  Yes, it was just over a month later as stated that it was discovered items weren't sent.  I must say I wasn't aware of the policy and didn't see the label.  I will know in the future that this exists and will ensure that every item is accounted for that's ordered.  I was sent an email asking for my review and I simply rated the experience.

Review.Titre: Great lights, Great Value, Bad Service
Review.Contenu: Edited due to the fact that they continue to be argumentative instead of addressing the issue. I have a screenshot of their website as of this morning that shows backorder status for the lights I actually received but I guess they don't check their own website. Ordered two different types of lights.  One showed to be on backorder, other did not.  I sent an email prior to ordering and was told I could go ahead and place the order and they'd ship them when they came in.  I paid, got a receipt, and then got a shipment notice.  Ended up receiving the lights that were listed as a backorder on the website, and not the ones that did not show as a backorder.  No one contacted me to let me know about any type of short shipment.  Following the directions on the box, I emailed customer service.I told them the lights that were showing as in stock (if you're showing backorder on one I assume the other is in stock) did not ship but the ones showing backordered did.  I got an argumentative response saying that your website did not show stock and the lights were 4 to 6 weeks out.The lights I DID receive are great.  I expected to have to wait on SOMETHING, so even that isn't an issue.  Had the shipment been short and someone communicated that, it would have been a 5 star rating.  Had the shipment been short and I got an update that wasn't argumentative, 4 stars just for me having to ask where the other lights were.  The quality of the lights and the value are why it's still at 3  stars and not lower.I would still recommend the company, just understand that you may or may not get what you ordered and customer service isn't going to tell you anything until you ask.

Review.Titre: Was not willing to work with me when a…
Review.Contenu: Was not willing to work with me when a error  occurred.

Review.Titre: Was not told that a bar I ordered was…
Review.Contenu: Was not told that a bar I ordered was on back order for several months and they wouldn’t let me cancel the order when I found out. I ordered a Whelen bar on 12/9/21 and have yet to receive it. StrobesnMore replied and said I received my order. I only received the dominator bar not the inner edge bar. They need to look at the whole order. I have had multiple orders and the person that replied may be talking about an order I have received and not looking at all the past orders.

Once u wait to receive the item and open the box, there will be a slip in there telling you it’s out of stock.Deceptive practice to help ensure u will not leave their site to go buy an in stock item elsewhere - eg Amazon.

Review.Titre: I placed an order for a Feniex light in…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for a Feniex light in December. The website says it was shipped January 5th. I called to check the status a few weeks later. She called back and said it would be about 3 weeks until my order shipped. I received poor customer service.

Review.Titre: Bad Service from Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I was Very Disappointed by Customer Service. I had placed 2 recent orders and was told I would get free shipping because of a problem on the first if I entered code on next order. I Forgot to use code on second order so tried on 3 ( Largest Order) it wouldn’t take Code. I called and they said it was because I added “Deal of the Day” and they wouldn’t be able to remove shipping. I cancelled the order!

Review.Titre: Quad
Review.Contenu: The quad lights themselves are amazing. However the hood bracket leaves a lot to be desired. The wiring for the light didn’t even come close to matching up with the hole in the bracket. The screw mounting holes were not big enough and had to be drilled out to the proper size. Last the set screws to hold it to the hood didn’t come with a wrench ( anything I’ve ever got before always has ). But no big deal I have a very big set however couldn’t find one the right size either to big or to small.

Review.Titre: Need "lens color" option at time of order/cart
Review.Contenu: The site needs to be a little more clear about what color the lenses are. I bought blue LEDs and the picture showed a blue lens so thats what I thought I was buying. But when they arrived all the lights were clear. Unless you read the small print in the description, it says clear lenses and the color lenses have to be special ordered. Now I have to eat the shipping (+ the insurance since it was $1000 worth of LEDs) to return the order and get the correct lights. There needs to be an option to pick what color lens along with what color LEDs

Review.Titre: I bought a strobes and more siren had 2…
Review.Contenu: I bought a strobes and more siren had 2 parts go wrong with the unit in the first 3 days I had it then I was told to pay for shipping to send the whole thing back after install it already instead of them just sending me a new unit with a shipping label so I did not have to wait for them to diagnose my original unit then tell me they would send me it back fixed. Review.Contenu: Ordered lights before Christmas - when I did not receive e-mail that they had been shipped, called and was informed they were being shipped from manufacturer - could expect shipment in late January.  No correspondence from company/manufacturer.  If I had not called, would not have known what happened to my order - An update on the status of my order would be appreciated!!

I will not be doing anymore business with Strobesnmore as there's lots of other LED light dealers that will honor sale prices most anytime.

I paid for one day shipping and now its been about 2 weeks because it had to be built. their products are good though so i cant complain about that

Review.Titre: Normally have no issues with…
Review.Contenu: Normally have no issues with strobesnmore but this is my second order within the last 6 months that "supposedly" the in stock items I ordered were actually out of stock and I was never told. Then I chatted with someone on customer service and got disconnected. So I called was given the story of I will call around and figure it out and send you an email with the run down within the hour. Still havent heard back a week later. If they are willing to help and make this right I am happy to change my review.

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: Item I ordered was not in stock. When I contacted and inquired about item I was told, it's back ordered and basically I should have called to ensure it was in stock. Well, if I am ordering a product online do you think maybe I did not want to be on the phone talking to anyone?

Review.Titre: Disappointed
Review.Contenu: I have ordered from many different vendors in since January and noticed a small delay in some of my orders, but none as terrible as this purchase. I just want to get this purchase out of the way and look for another Whelen dealer to do business in the future.

Review.Titre: Received my first order promptly but…
Review.Contenu: Received my first order promptly but with the 2nd order there is a 4-6 week lead time, nowhere on the page or website does it state that a custom order has a 4-6 week lead time. I would have not purchased if this was stated clearly. I feel this is deceptive and a poor business practice.

Review.Titre: Not exactly trilled with the new dash…
Review.Contenu: Not exactly trilled with the new dash strobe, as when you remove the screws for the mounts, they are pretty damn impossible to get them all the way back in. If I paid 50 bucks, I wouldn't say a work, bu for 160.00 quaility should be better.

Review.Titre: Very expensive for what you get
Review.Contenu: Very expensive for what you get - much better options for LED safety lighting - look elsewhere. Customer service is VERY slow. My wife purchased as a Christmas gift, I sent her a link

Review.Titre: Need better backorder system or just good customer service
Review.Contenu: I was not notified that my order was back ordered. I called yesterday at 10 days since submission and was told that the parts were on back order and would be a couple days yet. They have my email and phone number but never notified me of back order.

Review.Titre: Terrible experience
Review.Contenu: Failed to show on website that the product was not in stock, did not call to see if we could wait for it, gave bad information when we first called to check on availability, claimed "stocking order" was held up in customs on second call, then refused to cancel our order because "it was ordered just for you". Do not order from this company unless you confirm product availability, and whether they've labelled it as special order even if it's something they normally stock.Edit: after this review was posted, the company called back and agreed to refund our money and cancel the order. Added one star for the follow-up.

Review.Titre: Not happy!
Review.Contenu: Purchase two lights they stopped working, send them back on my dime. Got them back , they been installed for about 3 weeks , and stopped working again! It’s to much better work remove again and ship again, my loss! Will never purchase here again

Review.Titre: Very disappointing
Review.Contenu: Very disappointing! Coming up on one month from the order date and still waiting. I had to call to get an update and was told it must be a backorder issue.  This was not indicated on the website when the order was placed.  One item has been received that was drop shipped from the manufacturer.  This leads me to believe the other items were also not stock items but ordered from the manufacturer when my order was placed. This was not indicated on the website either. Stobesnmore has great prices, just not the product, and these items are for job that has been on hold for almost a month. I'm really glad my client is very patient.

Review.Titre: Customer service is not good
Review.Contenu: Customer service is not good. Received a product that turned out to be defective after about a month of use, really let me down in several situations where the product was needed but didn't work. Then they made me pay return shipping to send THEIR defective product back so that it can get fixed/replaced. Spoke to a "manager" that didn't really provide any good customer service or even cared about the customer's satisfaction at all and said that everyone else in the industry does the same. Way to stand out against the competition. I would not purchase through them again. Product was a Strobes N' More brand product.

Review.Titre: No packing slip included in shipment when received.
Review.Contenu: This review score is based solely on the fact no packing slip was included in the initial shipment.I had a multi item order, most of it showed up except for the main item needed. I emailed the company and they did inform me that the item was out of stock and would be shipped when in stock. I give the products ordered a 5 star rating, I give the response from the company a 5 star, however when I received the initial items there was no paperwork showing what was being delivered and what was backordered. This one piece of information could have cleared up the whole issue right from the beginning. This overall is a minor issue and I will be doing future business with the company, their products are outstanding.

Review.Titre: Still have not revieved my order…
Review.Contenu: I received an email with a link to track my order but is doesn't work.  You advertise that orders ship out in I believe 3 to 5 business days. I placed my order a few weeks ago and still have not received it.

Review.Titre: Strobesnmore TruDual 2.0 EFlood
Review.Contenu: My experience with Strobesnmore was ok. It was the product that under-performed.  I purchased an LED light bar recently and noticed significant condensation on the front lens after the vehicles first wash (normal hand wash - no pressure washer used) that lasted for several days. I contacted strobesnmore and was told that was normal and would not affect the performance of the light bar.  Being that I wash my truck once per week, that will mean that I will most likely always have a condensation issue and it detracts from the appearance of the product. I’ve never had this issue with any other light bar I’ve owned. While the light is impressive in function it is subpar in design and production.

Review.Titre: Great product fast shipping but one minor issue :(
Review.Contenu: The sirens I've ordered havent been installed yet so I cant review them yet but I will soon. The light I received I like and think will work out great. I would honestly be giving a 4 or 5 star review for strobes and more because the price was great and shipping was so fast! But that is where my issue is the sirens and light were ordered as a surprise gift for my sons vehicles so I put shipping address of a friend , the package was sent to my billing address instead of shipping so my son knew what his birthday gifts were and now is waiting till the date I scheduled to have them installed. I'm sure the siren will be just as nice as the light and I will review both at a later date.

Review.Titre: License plate light materials seem to…
Review.Contenu: License plate light materials seem to be good quality. One of the lights is out of sync in flood mode and flashes when the others illuminate solid, rendering the flood mode useless. I expect more for the price they charge.

Review.Titre: Not happy with your customer service
Review.Contenu: Not happy with your customer service. The product I bought is made by strokes n more them self, he could charge me a small fee to replace the wire from the unit out to the correct length of wire.

Review.Titre: I purchased the “tailgater” light and…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the “tailgater” light and within a couple of day being installed on my truck, it was full of condensation.  A couple day later I received a surgery on the item and explained the issue. I heard nothing back. So I waited a couple weeks and still heard nothing. At that point I called to ask what could be done about this issue. I was told I had to removed this light, send it back to be repaired or replaced. This would leave wires not connected and holes exposed to the elements until my light same back or a new one showed up. I find this very inconvenient and feel that since this light was still new, a new one should have been sent to me right away and then I could send the defective one back.

Review.Titre: Great products but poor customer…
Review.Contenu: Great products but poor customer service. I bought some items on 07/03/20 but less than 24 hours after I placed my orders, said items went on sale. So I emailed the sales department and the OWNER of the company asking if they can give me some sort of store credits for the items that I bought less than 24 hrs ago or cancel my orders so I can place a new order with the discount price. I got no answer until 3 days later and then was told “if you want a refund, wait for the initial order to be shipped and return the items once I get them so I can get a refund”....all I asked was to give me a store credit of the price difference which was like $50 total and they couldn’t do that. So like I said products are good but customer satisfaction is so so. Hope this help.

Review.Titre: The shipping charge was over $100.00…
Review.Contenu: The shipping charge was over $100.00 for two boxes that weighed 2 pounds.  UPS doesn't even charge that much. It totally cancelled out the sale price.

Review.Titre: Lens did not do what I was expecting to…
Review.Contenu: Lens did not do what I was expecting to do Did not know led lights behind lens are also colored LEDs.No option in notes about LED 900 color issues

Review.Titre: First time customer order
Review.Contenu: First time customer order:  I placed an order on 12/20/21 and became aware it was the wrong item.  I immediately called and talked with Brittany and she said she would cancel the order so it would not ship since we did place a corrected order. on 12/21/21 I received an email that the order was shipped.  I called and talked with Rebecca and she said that upper management did not see the cancellation and that a free shipping return label would be sent. On 12/28/21 I had not received the return label but but did receive a return form.  I called and talked with MaryBeth and was advised that upper management would not be sending a return label. The item was returned but because upper management failed to see the cancellation of the first order so we will not be reimbursed for our shipping cost to return the item.  I think upper management should do the right thing and reimburse for their lack of communication.

Review.Titre: Prior to ordering the Strobes N' More…
Review.Contenu: Prior to ordering the Strobes N' More Dual Color 2X9 Dash Lights, I asked if they would be able to mount to my SUV's rear windows which are flat, and they said they would mount just fine.Unfortunately because of the weight (these lights are heavy) and the angle at which the lights are being placed, the two suction cups which are supplied do not hold the lights in place.I asked customer service if they could send me 8 new suction cups free of charge since I called in advanced and I was told they would mount just fine, but all they would offer is free shipping.In my opinion Strobesnmore could have afforded work with a customer who just spent $931.24 and take a loss of $7.96.To me it's a no brainer and now I wonder if they will actually honor the warranties they offer on their lights.

Review.Titre: Important issue not clearly stated on order page
Review.Contenu: I didn't realize that they would ship the package to my BILLING address, not my shipping address. They said they don't ship things to people with a different billing and shipping address to help control fraud. When I emailed and included a screengrab of the invoice that clearly showed the SHIPPING address to be different, they said it was in their Terms and Conditions, which I had to click on to complete the sale. I told them that they know as well as anyone that most people don't read that carefully. When I suggested they make the Shipping vs. Billing very clear with a note on the Billing and Shipping page, they pretty much said, nah, tough luck...not gonna do it.So I have a package sitting 2000 miles away that I can't get to for another 2 months until I get there. My last order with them; I've ordered a few of their products before, but not again after this.

The patterns are also easy to change and satisfactory.The concern is the cigarette plug.  Maybe some type of retainer to keep the male and female a little tighter would be helpful.  Zip ties can work but there is most likely a more creative solution out there.

Review.Titre: The new purchase and the strobes were…
Review.Contenu: The new purchase and the strobes were top notch. These were to replace a pair that quit working in under 5yrs and when I called in, I was told that they were no longer available and there would be no warranty on the old models. Now I know there is only a few months left on the warranty but it shouldn't be advertised as a 5 yr warranty if you don't stand behind the product.

Review.Titre: I think the strobes are great but the…
Review.Contenu: I think the strobes are great but the service and general data available on these lights leaves a lot to be desired. Simple things like physical dimensions and accurate mounting data are not available. Called in to get hold of that data and the staff didn’t even have it.

Review.Titre: Great Products, Poor Shipping
Review.Contenu: Great products at a reasonable price. However they shipped my order and did not inform me that a signature was required and they had it locked so I could not call UPS and allow them to deliver without a signature. This made it highly inconvenient.

Review.Titre: Great products — need shipping update!b
Review.Contenu: Great products. I’m a repeat customer. However one item from my order wasn’t shipped and I haven’t been able to get an update after several attempts.

Review.Titre: Some items are not in stock for long…
Review.Contenu: Some items are not in stock for long periods of time. It should say that on the website.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping. Feniex fusion 6 has no directions from manufacturer their website is down with instructions. Had to call and have them send instructions which do not match or explain how to hook up. They sent two different instructions sheets for different lights and said you can figure it out. And videos also do not help. Feniex customer service is not helpful either just tell you to look at the instructions on website. It all has to mainly do with the quad converter that has waaay to many wires that should have just been built into the light like everyone else does. F for instructions on wiring.

Review.Titre: Just be straight with your customers
Review.Contenu: I ordered two led lights that I thought were in stock. There was no mention at the time of order that they were not in stock. Only after making a phone call a week after ordering, did I find out I would have to wait at least another 2 weeks before both items might be available. It would be nice know if something is out of stock prior to ordering.

Review.Titre: Dissapointed on the customer service…
Review.Contenu: Dissapointed on the customer service with this order. No like Strobes N More past experiences. Had trouble placing order online, finally placed order by calling in. 1 item arrived as usual. 2nd item is on back order which nobody indicated. Won't have the lights for 2 months. It would have been nice if they could have informed me of the back order when I placed the order. Or at least indicated on the invoice when the first item was shipped that the second item was on back order. They didn't, no mention of any back order at all. This is the first bad experience with Strobes N More.

Review.Titre: I was very disappointed in the fact…
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed in the fact that I was able to place my order and not 1 single place did it say anything about be out of stock. Not did it say anything about being 2 months out. I would have never known this until I called and asked about it.

Review.Titre: lack of communication
Review.Contenu: I give 3 stars due to the lack of communication. I ordered a full-size lightbar couple weeks ago and haven’t heard anything on long it’s going to take before it ships. I understand it’s a third party transaction and it’s a “special order” product and may take longer to ship but, at least let customers know what that eta will be from the manufacturers. Also, don’t sell these items as they’re in stock if they aren’t. Otherwise my transaction has been okay.

Review.Titre: Secure mount issues
Review.Contenu: The Velcro connections for the strobes n more secure mounts are great, but the double sided tape that connects them to the rubber mount and to the window leaves a lot to be desired, I have already had them fall from the window and peel off from the Velcro.... recommend that their R&D folks find a better solution then 3M tape.

Review.Titre: Decent
Review.Contenu: The products seem to be great, very bright for a good price. Customer service is great. However, items were left out of my order that should’ve been included, that forced me to have to go to a hardware store and spend more money than I had to. SNM did send me the correct mounting parts eventually for my e66 max and passenger side interior light bar, but it was too late. I would encourage SNM to include a battery connector for wiring as well, as I have to go out of my way to buy that as well.

Review.Titre: Brought these to get installed and the…
Review.Contenu: Brought these to get installed and the tech was concerned of the legitimacy of the whelen ions. Due to the fact the product code was not correct and their was a sticker correcting the product code on the bag. Although they seem legit and are bright I just have concerns if these did come from whelen. Comparing them to the ions the installer had the codes were different although they were the same lights. Eg IONXB vs IONB (but were smoked)

Review.Titre: Mounting brackets never came with the…
Review.Contenu: Mounting brackets never came with the light. Missed a install I had to schedule two months ago because of this issue. Now I have to wait another month and a half to have lights installed because of this era. Not happy about this. This is the second light I ordered from strobe and more that didn’t come with the mounting brackets.

Review.Titre: I got the strobes n mores dual color…
Review.Contenu: I got the strobes n mores dual color interior light bar. - not the greatest patterns - the product does not come with a list of patterns. Why not??- not really what you would expect from a dual color bar (dual color patterns)- very bright thoughi asked if there was going to be sale and they said not anytime soon. Then 2 days after the 2 week return window there was a sale for 60$ off the LB i bought. They said they can't honor it.

Review.Titre: Always room for improvement!
Review.Contenu: When you have a rewards program that really doesn't reward large purchasers (PO's: not happy), when you've spend hundreds of dollars on an order and no free shipping (not happy), send sales out on holiday weekends when municipal offices at Fire and Police Departments are closed, so they can't benefit from the sale (not happy), etc.. Note: spend $75 on Amazon and most places on the internet and get free shipping. Otherwise the products themselves are great!

Review.Titre: Recently purchased some merchandise but…
Review.Contenu: Recently purchased some merchandise but only half of my order was delivered.  When purchasing my order the comments stated all items were in stock and ready to ship, but now 4 weeks after my initial order I'm waiting on the second half of my order. Strobenmore did not even offer to compensate me any discount of free shipping off my order. I believe at a minimum they should deduct the shipping cost from my order just because they misinformed me when stating "All merchandise in stock and ready to ship". Any decent big corporation would offer some kind of discount or free shipping due to their inability to provide a timely order shipment.Respectfully Deputy C.  Bryla Harris County Sheriff's Office Houston Texas and pround U.S. Army Veteran.

Review.Titre: Liars
Review.Contenu: Lied about their inventory twice which made me look like a liar to the client. Now they're refusing to give me an itemized return receipt as it appears they only refunded a partial amount.

Review.Titre: Everything went well for several of my…
Review.Contenu: Everything went well for several of my orders but I think if you’re a consistent customer and you’re spending 10k a year, you should be allowed free shipping for every order. Otherwise I start shopping around to see who else can compete with slightly higher prices but free shipping

Review.Titre: I would give 4 stars for the products…

Review.Titre: Call before you buy online.

After I placed the order and received no email of confirmation I called and spoke to someone. They told me the items were out of stock and on backorder. I had to order different items to get them in the time frame needed. Was ordered 12/19. Items are scheduled to be delivered today. 1/2.

Review.Titre: Like to product but don't like the…
Review.Contenu: Like to product but don't like the policy.  I bought several LEDs costing a couple of hundred dollars.  They went on sale right after purchase and company would NOT adjust price of issue and credit towards future purchases.

Review.Contenu: The lights arrived pretty quick, though one light was damaged and when I requested they ship me the replacement asap they said no they need to wait till they receive the damaged light, and this was a big problem as I had a scheduled installation that could not go as planned because they refused to ship the replacement before receiving the damaged part. Very poor Customer service. BTW I offered to email them an overnight UPS label on my account for them to ship asap. They refused.

Review.Titre: Be Careful
Review.Contenu: As far as I can tell their products are really good.My experience was this: I ordered an item that was on sale and received a call the next day saying that the item I ordered wasn't available but a similar but more expensive item was available. The price on the more expensive item was still reasonable. After I asked several times they did take $5 off the price but it seems a little 'scammy'. Their shipping charges are unusually high as well.

Review.Titre: Good concept the top panel rattles like…
Review.Contenu: Good concept the top panel rattles like hell when driving ,should be better cushion between top panel and bottom ,would be better if bolts on back panel where larger connecting top and bottom  ,call strobes and more last week still waiting to hear back ,got sales girl. Got some bugs but good

Review.Titre: Obviously selling quality products with…
Review.Contenu: Obviously selling quality products with the Whelen brand. Be careful paying  extra for expedited shipping. I payed for two day, ordering on Wednesday, I received it on Monday. I called just to see if I could get a refund just for the extra cost.....no can do I was told. Uh? I wonder if Summit Racing sells Whelen....

Review.Titre: Rec'd wrong product
Review.Contenu: Rec'd. wrong productIt may not be there fault, since the box was marked Blue/Amber on a E-Bar mini bar I just received,  but QA should have double checked to see if actually was.   So for this opinion I marked them as 3 stars.,  all other dealing I Have had with Strobe-N-More has been spot on.

Review.Titre: Purchasing experiance was fine
Review.Contenu: Purchasing experiance was fine, very easy, the product was very nice and works great, however I had to replace the supplied magnet with a much stronger aftermarket magnet. Very weak out of the box. They claim its temporary, however as a first responder I dont drive 35mph down a state highway to a call.

Review.Titre: Would have given 5 stars but being my…
Review.Contenu: Would have given 5 stars but being my slimlighter was defective  (not your fault) and I had to pay to ship it to whelen to get it fixed it replaced and now I don't have a light to respond to fire calls with for an undetermined time, that is why I didnt give you 5.

Review.Titre: Strobes work great for about 3-5 months…
Review.Contenu: Strobes work great for about 3-5 months then they started getting moisture inside of the lens.  Within a year three out of the 4 stopped working. I have bought several sets of 4 through this company (several different styles) with about a 40-50 percent fail rate.  When the strobes work they are awesome.

Review.Titre: Great dash light, not so great suction cups.....
Review.Contenu: Got the dual color 2x9 amber/white dash light and can honestly say that the lights are bright and work great and the price is reasonable. However the suction cups are not the greatest, the lights keeps coming off my windshield and find my self having to reinstall just about every day even though I cleaned my windshield very good. Trying to find a way to permanently mounted in the center below my rear view mirror. Don’t know if there is a bracket for that. Can’t lay it on my dash cause the light gets hot. Other than that I would of given it a five star.

Review.Titre: Warranties are not worth it
Review.Contenu: Warranties are not worth it, to much trouble to have to go to someone else to get it replacedWhelen 900 led called y’all and you sent me to whelen where I had to pay them $309.00 to get another one till I paid UPS to send it back and still have not received my money back are a new light

Review.Titre: Strobe n more is just ok
Review.Contenu: Strobe n more is just ok, they have a good selection and decent prices but their shipping both cost and speed is poor.Replying to strobesnmore it doesn’t cost $19 to send 4 lightheads across the country in my experience, I expect you have a corporate account which increases the discount. All my orders have taken several business days to even ship, then 5-10 days to arrive. Your competitors do shipping better and are my first Reccomendation to others.  You have some niche products that are great. Great opportunity to improve. And thanks for the reply.

Review.Titre: Lights are good, info accuracy not so much
Review.Contenu: I bought two of the snm triple threat lights. The website said they could be custom made (I wanted red, white and blue since I do a ton of parades) only to be told it couldn’t.  I was in a rush so I got the red/blue combo.  The lights are excellent but the yellow synch wire was so short that it was nearly impossible to get them together. I emailed them to find out what type of wire I could use to link them, never got a response. The quality of the lights are good, but they should update the website for more accuracy if something cannot be custom.

Review.Titre: There was no follow-up to my order…
Review.Contenu: There was no follow-up to my order notifying me of shipping/delivery.  I had to call several times to find out status.  It took over a month to get some parts and their customer service person ( a male) was brash at best.  They do typically have fair prices but service is lacking.

Review.Titre: product is good
Review.Contenu: product is good, but i don't find helpful videos to install it my self it is hard to find people to install it, in my opinion need to make videos and post on website easy to find to install a expensive product, finally i figure how to install it by my self but it was really hard to me find the use of the yellow wire because the pdf document which have the specification of installation, don't explain the use for it. believe or not i went on 4 different types of mechanics which they know about car electric systems, 3 of them refuse to install it, one of them try to charge me 600 dollars labor only.

Review.Titre: Optimistic
Review.Contenu: I like their service and some of their products but where they try to get you his offer you a deal on something and then when you go to check out and see the price on the shipping you're not saving anything that's my opinion and the return policy sucks

Review.Titre: should of been 5 star
Review.Contenu: i love everything about the bar light,electrical pre-wired,patterns are easy to use Controller is perfectly laid out and easy to use. .very bright day or night. However the controller wiring is very very fragile. Main power lead fuse probably 20 gauge wire is actually soldered to control board and loosely placed in back of box. It will absolutely will fail in time if you don't break it during install. Be very careful if you have to change fuse.Be extremely careful during install the wires on back of control box are very small and fragile to say the least.This light bar should  be a 5 star it is excellent except for control wiring.

Review.Titre: Don’t special order
Review.Contenu: Well, I mistakenly ordered “special order strobe, and it’s been 3 weeks and counting still nothing. It has to come from factory. I could have installed photo eye. Can’t cancel order. Strobes and more is a good outfit just don’t get special order items

Review.Titre: I ordered two items this time.
Review.Contenu: I ordered two items this time. One arrived and the other is still on back order. I was never offered anything other than  to wait longer. No refund option or possible substitute. Not that I would take either but no other solution was offered.

Review.Titre: Products seem quality
Review.Contenu: Products seem quality, however they are not the most moral company. They don’t like to honor advertised discounts, even when the discount is sent directly to your email from them.

Review.Titre: I feel that some of the strobes listed…
Review.Contenu: I feel that some of the strobes listed don't have proper explanations of their functions. I ordered the whelen strip light plus warning light but wanted the sequence version. I thought, by the description given, that there was a compartment light version and the other was a warning/sequence version. it wasn't until after I received the lights i noticed that it was just a warning light. I listed them on a fb website and it seems a lot of ppl thought the same thing as I did, as they sent me the listing from ur website, and were confused. ur listing does clarify the difference but with the descriptions being merged together its unclear or confusing that these come in 3 different models.

Review.Titre: Ordering was fine shipping is not.
Review.Contenu: Ordering was fine, had some problems with PayPal but that is not your fault.  My issue is with getting the item I ordered.  I ordered and paid for is #M08T-RBRBR, an emergency light array for a Harley.  After 2 weeks of hearing nothing from you I called and was told that the estimated shipping date was going to be October 31 which is 3 months AFTER I placed the order.  I know you call this a custom build but you did not list what a standard build was.  As I told you before, once I receive, if I receive the item I have to remove the red and blue lights and replace them with white and amber because that is not part of your selection.  You would not ship it without lights in it so I had to make a choice.  Anyway my problem is with the shipping time, 3 months is ridicules.

Review.Titre: Terrible warranty service
Review.Contenu: Great place to purchase lighted warning devices. But if you need warranty Stobes & More will refer you to the manufacture which sucks since your purchase was made through them. This makes warrant claims very difficult...

Review.Titre: Ordered special item still waiting for…
Review.Contenu: Ordered special item still waiting for it to arrive i was on time schedule with install for plow vehicle to be inspected by municipality now have to wait hoping no snow storms until it is installed or customer cannot plow

Review.Titre: The product was great but I gave 3…
Review.Contenu: The product was great but I gave 3 stars because the shipping was entirely too high. Shipping was almost as much as the product. I had to pay the shipping because I could not find the product anywhere else.

Review.Titre: Prices are good but getting technical…
Review.Contenu: Prices are good but getting technical install advice was not.Incoming receptionist was not very friendly and though technician was pleasant enough he did not offer much assistance with questions regarding installation.

Review.Titre: I would have given five stars but the…
Review.Contenu: I would have given five stars but the Instructions included with this kit were terrible. I own a 2020 F350 and this kit says it is compatible with 2017-2019 but I bought kit for 2020. It turns out that they are the same but all of the messages I left with Strobes and More went unanswered and I had to figure this all out on my own.  So I went online and found the same thing, one terrible 2 MINUTE video that didn't explain anything and and just showed clips of some guy plugging stuff in with much explanation or close up shots of the panels.   Once I had it installed, 8 hours later, It all worked great and I'm impressed with the quality of the product, BUT, COME ON GUYS this is the world of Youtube, pull your head out and make a decent video.

Review.Titre: I recieved the product very fast and…
Review.Contenu: I recieved the product very fast and was very happy about the delivery time. But the product leaked water all over the inside of my truck when it rained out. I contacted strobes n more and never got a response back.

Review.Titre: Just Okay For The Price
Review.Contenu: I bought the blue light for my son. It's powerful for such a small product. My son, though, felt it's not well-made, and a part of it had already separated from the housing. He kept it anyway.

Review.Titre: PAID UP FRONT then waiti 7 weeks
Review.Contenu: Stilll awaiting balance of order from supplier to StrobesNMore to me. Invoiced and fully paid 3 weeks ago, with another 4 weeks to wait,  Unusual to pay for something not even available.

Review.Titre: Like the light
Review.Contenu: Like the light, but the suction cups will not stay stuck to the windshield and the right side white light stays on when the white or blue sis is selected.  I will try return the light.

Review.Titre: The shipping could have been smoother
Review.Contenu: The shipping could have been smoother.  Initially they calculated $17 shipping  ( UPS ground ) from Rhode Island to NJ, on a switch I was ordering which was under $20, and maybe a 1/4 pound in weight!  After contacting customer service I received a “ship free” code to apply to the item at checkout.  There were also no updates on the package or tracking number tied to my email.  I work on the road quite a bit and find the arrival information vital, especially when the item ordered is holding up the installation of a warning light beacon.  The problem is most of us are use to dealing with Amazon which almost gives too much “update” information.  The item was packaged well and in pristine shape.  Other than the shipping policy, I like the products Strobes and More sells.  Hope this helps

Review.Titre: LED lights late

Review.Titre: After many years of purchasing…
Review.Contenu: After many years of purchasing equipment from strobes N More, I have to say I was extremely disappointed in the last order I placed.  I purchased a Havis console over the phone during which time I gave the customer service representative the type of radio, siren, Etc. that was supposed to get mounted.  She looked up the bracket numbers advising me the brackets should fit the application.  When I received the console, only one of the three brackets were correct.  When I called customer service, I was told they could not do anything about it that I would have to purchase the correct brackets for approx. 40.00. (AFTER JUST SPENDING 400.00 ON IT) I than explained that I was not that one who gave them incorrect part numbers and the 400.00 console I just purchased will not work with the brackets I was given.  I was than told I would have to contact Havis to resolve the issue.  I did contact Havis and they sent me the correct brackets and extra filler plates at no charge.  What really disappoints me the most is that I just recently spent SEVERAL THOUSAND DOLLARS with Strobes N More equipping two vehicles with lights, sirens and other equipment.

Review.Titre: Shipping cost too high
Review.Contenu: Product itself is great, but I thought shipping rates were too high to Hawaii. Other websites were 1/4 the price.

Review.Titre: Great products and service but shipping…

Review.Titre: Sliver/ Sliver II
Review.Contenu: I purchased multiple lights from Strobes n More. When I had a issue with one of my Slivers, they sent me a replacement, as to their 5 yr warranty, unfortunately they sent me a updated Sliver II model that would not work with my other 3 Sliver lights, forcing me to purchase 3 more Sliver II's. When I asked if they would discount the others because I was forced to purchase them, they refused. After having the Sliver II's in my vehicle for 2 months, I had a issue with 2 of the new Sliver II's. After sending them back, they told me nothing was wrong with them and sent them back to me. After rewiring my truck and putting them back in, as per Strobes n More, they still didnt work properly. Calling back again and sending them back, they stated nothing was wrong with them. They finally, after me sending 2 more back, they replaced 2 of the Sliver II's with E6 Slims and discounted 2 other E6 Slims for me. My complaint is I had to do all the labor and time to install and uninstall these lights multiple times. Imagine if I had to pay someone to do all that labor??? It would have costed me a arm and leg!! Also I am out of a lot of money with Sliver and Sliver II's I am not using. Thank god the different person I talked to the 3rd time gave me 2 E6 Slims for free as a warranty and a discounted price to purchase 2 more E6 Slims. I believe they had a issue with the Sliver lights because they are discontinued now, and being replaced with the E6 Slims.

Review.Titre: Nice people that's all I can say
E beacon
Review.Contenu: I bought the E beacon lights for my truck. I work in the asphalt business therefore I spend my days in the road. Though these lights are on the more affordable end. Because they were made by strobesnmore I assumed nothing but the best. I’ve been extremely happy with every other product I’ve purchased but sadly these lights were sub par. They cannot be seen on sunny days which didn’t work for me. I’m not knowledgeable on the differences of classes of lights but these ones just aren’t bright. I contacted strobesnmore. They offered to have me send them in to look at them to make sure they were working properly. I can’t go without lights. Asked to replace them or exchange for a better light and I’d be happy to pay the difference. The owner of strobesnmore sadly wouldn’t help with any of that and from there I haven’t heard back since. So my advice would be to really know what your buying before making the purchase. Unfortunately due to this situation I will not be making anymore purchases with strobesnmore. They make false claims like this reply below that they tested my lights. I sure don’t remember sending my lights that I purchased from you in for you to test them? When did that happen? What good would testing any other light than the ones on my truck? Why would you want to resell these sub par lights to someone else anyways? Why is it my fault you sold me these lights that don’t serve the purpose? Like I said make sure you know what your buying before you purchase from strobesnmore because this is what you deal with if it doesn’t work properly or perform to proper standards. What a nightmare, I’ve wasted more time than it’s worth on this. Bought new Whelen beacons and won’t have to worry again. My complaint was they were dim and couldn’t be seen in the daylight. Did you test my lights or ones you had there? There’s no sense in wasting time with this and going back and forth. It’s my fault for not not testing each one before I brought them to be installed I guess. Guess it’s my fault I bought them and I’m not happy with them. Just would of expected a better outcome. Hence why I say to make sure you know what your getting from strobesnmore before you have them installed. Have a nice day.

Review.Titre: Decent product at a fair price.
Suction cups don't hold
Outrageous shipping
Poor customer service reps but was fast on shipping.
Review.Contenu: I placed a order within the last 2 weeks.  The turn around time was spot on and the order shipped out to me quickly.  If I could rate only the products availability and getting my order fast it would be a 5 star scored review.However, that is not the case.  The online strobes n more website offers online chat.  The chat/service/answering questions and overall attitude of the rep via chat is useless. I was browsing the site on several different occasions compiling my order.  I had a few questions to be clear on some products, compatibility etc..  I always got the same female by the name of Sarah.  Sarah was not just unfriendly every single encounter with short 1 or 2 word responses but mid first question she vanishes.  She then almost answered 1 question then silence again for 10 + mins.  It’s always bad service when a customer is trying to spend their money yet receives a rep that is in and out of the conversation with no explanation as to why.  It’s obvious she is distracted by something else.  Once in dialogue with a customer on chat It should be treated just as I was on the phone speaking to her.  Unfortunately this is not the case.  In chat going over some products and she goes silent.  I am literally saying “Hello? Can I get some help with my order please?”  More silence then a “Tech”? person chimes in to tell me that Sarah answered the phone from a customer”(??)  However, I am a new customer trying to put a order together to place right then and I even said that.  So I got bypassed by the phone?  I do not understand why a chat box automatically pops up on the website offering to help you but you get dropped if the phone rings?  This is a huge waste of time for the customer.  I needed about 7 items on my initial first order of many to come.  I patiently waited a good 30 minutes needing some answers prior to placing a order.  Sarah never came back, no follow up message, nothing at all.  I was over it so I picked a product I was familiar with and purchased that item only.  The customer service rep was too busy to help me even though I was chatting with her before the phone rang from someone else.  I am very understanding if employees are only 1 or 2 at the phones and chat.  Most customer service reps would apologize with a brief explanation of their situation.  Also giving some idea of when they could help you.  Perhaps she would suggest to call me.  Sarah just vanishes without a word.  Long story short I purchased the one item for $300+ and went to another dealer who knows how important good service is.  He helped me right away, good attitude, very informative, took his time to answer any questions and he gave advice on how to make things run smoothly.  It took less than 30 minutes.  I was not dropped for another customer, ignored, no vanishing acts or any of that method of treating customers.  I have since made 4 purchases with that same competitor with no issues at all.  I possibly may buy another product again from strobes but It would have to be a product I know well.  However, if I get Sarah I will not waste any more of my time like I have already.

Review.Contenu: Really like the dual colors amber for my plowing and the red for the fire dept. much brighter than my old strobe. I would have liked a longer cord  I was not able to route the cave properly. In my Silverado. An extra five feet would have mage a large difference. I like the strobe.

Review.Titre: Great products and customer service overall
Review.Contenu: Nothing to complain about really, just wish it would have been free shipping for the amount of money that was spent.

Review.Titre: I used their gear primarily to retrofit…
Review.Contenu: I used their gear primarily to retrofit a partially de-commissioned CVPI for security work. The hide away strobes were easy to install and are very bright. I do not know if the supplied gaskets keep out moisture, they are a cushion type material not rubber. There is some fogging in both headlight lens that was not there before the install. It should be noted, I used new OEM replacement headlights for the install. If you are running the control boxes in the trunk you have to buy an inordinate amount of extensions (8) at 9 bucks a pop to make it work. I had to get one extension to just outfit four hide aways in the rear reflector assembly and tailights, for a control box ALSO located in the trunk, which is ridiculous. The base set of wiring for each strobe should be 12 feet at least. This change would have eliminated half my extension purchases. The extensions have a nice shielded (easy to pull) individually wrapped hot and ground wire with a proprietary connection link. The shadow siren/light controller is fantastic and does a lot at its price point. I have divided the lights up on the supplied four switches A. rear (4 hideaways), B. Front (4 hideaways), C. (front amber x2 in grill), D. red/blue front grill. Siren tones are crisp and the PA function is clear through the siren that came on the vehicle. The remote function on the Shadow allows you to mount the control box out of the way in the trunk. You can then run the supplied (16 ft) RJ11 to the driver's seat where you plug in the handset. The handset itself is made with thin plastic, so I do not know how durable it is. I did not see replacement handsets on sale. You may need one during the life of the unit. Since the handset is so thin, I am scared to try to use the magnetic mic holder I got from SandM for fear of drilling into a vital component and voiding the warranty. I called their tech guys with a question regarding the 2 power inputs into the siren controller, and if they could be hard wired from one line from the battery. When pulling the wires back I had not anticipated needing 2 power lines to power one controller. Maybe it is necessary if you are running 2 sirens or siren/growler. Only one of the power inputs has a fuse on the line and BOTH should come with a fuse in a plastic housing based on that conversation. In all great customer service and tech support.

Review.Titre: Strobes n More has great products
Review.Contenu: I like Strobes n More and love their products. They have some of the brightest lights on the market with a great warranty. Only reason not 5 stars is I do feel that some of the smallest items and accessories are overpriced. L brackets for mounting grill light is an example of one. The only other complaint is no free shipping. Free shipping should be offered once your have purchased a certain amount like $100 for example.

Review.Titre: Just installed on my 18 f-250
Review.Contenu: Just installed on my 18 f-250 and to say you need to be a flexible person is an understatement but I finally got everything plugged in. Works great on my truck and haven’t had a chance to go through all the patterns. My only major complaint is it’s not working my trailer lights. I may be dreaming but was under the influence that this did the trailer lights as well maybe I’m wrong.

Review.Titre: Finally Found one
Review.Contenu: I have been searching for this product for quite some time. I had one before that I got from Tractor Supply but couldn’t find it again (sold the vehicle). I’m glad I could find through Strobes and More. My only issue was that the remote battery was dead and I needed to go purchase one to test the unit.

Review.Titre: The only issue I had was in payment
Review.Contenu: The only issue I had was in payment. I evidently put in some incorrect information and my credit card was declined. I didn't know it was incorrect information.  It would have been helpful if it would have told me.  Instead I had to call and wait for someone who told me in a matter of seconds that the billing zipcode was wrong. I highly recommend Strobesnmore, but the shipping was slow but don't think that it was there fault. Also there shipping is not free like all the other places.

The only con is I wished the installation directions had the amp draws for the lights noted as this would have helped with selection of the correct size wiring and fuses needed.

Review.Contenu: Initial order was incorrect, ordered 2 lights only got one.Contacted Customer Service and was informed the order had to be reviewed.   I was relieved/pleasantly surprised when I was informed it was an error on your end and my order was filled.I know in today's world there are many scammers, but not being brought up that way I was worried this was going to end up being a hassle.Glad we both got good results.

Review.Titre: High hopes, then let down
Review.Contenu: So I bought the triple threat dual color light, it is indeed dual color but you can't flash both colors together. It should say "Single Dual Color Triple Threat" which if it was dual color flashing together I was gonna do my whole fleet with the triple threat, however it seems that strobes more are behind in time, in making dual color flashing lights. The only thing I wasn't disappointed with is in how bright it really was, I was impressed until both colors couldn't flash together

Review.Titre: The product looks good
Review.Contenu: The product looks good, though I have not installed it yet in my experimental aircraft. The technical support was grumpy: I had to really lean in to try to find out what the width of illumination is for the surface star light--nobody on the staff knows! They should know--it's easy enough to figure out, and it's a valuable metric for a light that's used for illumination or visibility. I did get useful advice to include a 5 amp fuse on the circuit. I think you have made a good product and want to support it. Lewis's videos are helpful.

Review.Titre: While I haven’t purchased a lot from Strobes…
Review.Contenu: While I haven’t purchased a lot from Strobes N More, I have purchased lights on a few occasions. So far, I haven’t had any issues with their service or their product (3 of the 4 items I’ve purchased thus far have been Strobes N More branded) and until something changes, I’ll continue to do business with them.

Review.Titre: Dual Threat LED Blue Light
Review.Contenu: Recently signed on at my local volunteer fire department and needed a blue light. Decided to order the Dual Threat blue light to get me started. Absolutely love the light,  but the little suction cups for easy mounting are basically garbage,  they won't hold no matter what I do,  Otherwise this light would have gotten a solid 5 stars .

Review.Titre: Acari F150 Low Profile Steel Strobe…
Review.Contenu: Acari F150 Low Profile Steel Strobe MountMy order processed and shipped quickly. The product met all expectations, however installation instructions could be clearer. The written instructions are not specific to vehicle, but are written with a broad brush for many makes and models. But with a little bit of common sense and referencing an online installation video for a different model truck, I was successful.

Review.Contenu: Ordered 8 photon, 2 cobra, 2 atom 60, and a tail gator. Strobes are great. Wish they all were wired the same way. Became a bit confusing because there were 3 different ways the strobes were wired by color. To make them all work together off one controller proved to be slow moving to make sure it was done right. But the strobes are very bright.

Review.Titre: Thanks for delivering the light we…
Review.Contenu: Thanks for delivering the light we needed quickly and efficiently.  Our only problem was that we needed a red optics style lens on the light, to match the other side of the fire truck.  The salesperson did not understand that the red rendering LED was not all that we needed.  Given my good past experiences, I'll put it down to a misunderstanding/miscommunication.

Review.Titre: Great product but.
Review.Contenu: The product is great. I purchased it for the backup light feature. I had some technical questions that were answered quickly and professionally. The only thing that I think could be improved were the installation instructions. Maybe it was just me but the hardware instructions were a little weak. Got the light installed and I am very satisfied with them.

Review.Titre: Decent light
Review.Contenu: This light is very sturdy, very rugged, and bright. However, the light shape as well as size is disappointing. Because of the round edges, there is very little light output on the ends of the light. I do recommend Strobes N More. Great place for products and the customer service is better than any other in the industry.

Review.Titre: Great company.. Some products take longer then others
Review.Contenu: Strobes N More is a great company. I purchased a made to order item now 3 weeks ago and it is still in production but they were pretty quick on letting me know updates. Contacted SNM a couple times to figure out questions about it and they were pretty quick on getting back to me. Hopefully my product is sent to me soon but if not then it is not on SNM rather Feniex.

Review.Titre: Lights are awesome!
Review.Contenu: Lights are awesome and definitely bright! But I installed two in my taillights and two in my headlights on a 2011 f150 short bed and I had already ordered two 10ft extensions and that still was not enough so I had to add wire to both sides coming from the taillights and also the instructions aren’t the best if your wiring them to a momentary switch, other than that I love them
